task.title: Associating a Floating IP with an Instance

context.p: Your VM instance boots without a public-facing IP address.

step.cmd:
In the main Instancesview, in the Actions column of the new instance record, click Associate Floating IP (or More Associate Floating IP
).
step.stepresult: The Manage Floating IP Associations dialog appears.

step.cmd: Map an unallocated floating IP to the new instance. If the No floating IP addresses allocated message is displayed, you can allocate a new IP address by clicking +.

taskbody.postreq: After you associate a floating IP to the instance, configure the DNS.
